name: Douche Daddy Simulator
description:
Bored of people-pleasers? Looking to roast your friend without fear of social ostracism? Look no further… with Douche Daddy Simulator, spice up your life with a life-altering dinner full of offensive jokes!!!

CW: Racism, sexism, homophobia, and all the -isms and phobias that could possibly be offensive; not for the faint hearted.

I made this for Nat Mesnard's Introduction to Interactive Fiction workshop at Kenyon Review Young Writers' Workshop. This is a working story prototype and I might add some more content soon! Shoutout to Nat for being an incredible instructor, the directors Tory and Adam and RAs for running the camp smoothly, and my peers for making memories that I'll keep forever in my heart.
